data.text:
――A day off. I was planning on buying a book for training, 
and then keeping the rest of the day casual……
data.processed:
󠁿――A day off. I was planning on buying a book for training, 
󠁿and then keeping the rest of the day casual……

data.text:
Ah, Trainer-san. Hello~ 
……Back from the bookstore?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, Trainer-san. Hello~ 
󠁿……Back from the bookstore?

data.text:
Oh~…… I can't read the title because it's got so many difficult 
kanji. Something something, priority…… -metry-……?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: A book we can use for training

data.processed:
󠁿Oh~…… I can't read the title because it's got so many difficult 
󠁿kanji. Something something, priority…… -metry-……?

data.text:
I see. ……Even thinking about training on your day off, 
as usual you're quite enthusiastic, huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I see. ……Even thinking about training on your day off, 
󠁿as usual you're quite enthusiastic, huh?

data.text:
(Hmmmm~. It's something for me…… wouldn't it 
be better for me to tag along? Doesn't feel 
right to just leave with a 『Good Work』)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(Hmmmm~. It's something for me…… wouldn't it 
󠁿be better for me to tag along? Doesn't feel 
󠁿right to just leave with a 『Good Work』)

data.text:
Trainer-san, where are you heading next? 
Got some more shopping to do?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san, where are you heading next? 
󠁿Got some more shopping to do?

data.text:
I hadn't really decided on anything yet but, I told her 
I was thinking about seeing a movie or doing some karaoke.
data.processed:
󠁿I hadn't really decided on anything yet but, I told her 
󠁿I was thinking about seeing a movie or doing some karaoke.

data.text: Eh, so normal……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Eh, so normal……

data.text:
Ah, ahaha. No, I didn't mean that in a bad way. 
I see, I see. Then~…… how about going together?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, ahaha. No, I didn't mean that in a bad way. 
󠁿I see, I see. Then~…… how about going together?

data.text:
I happen to have some free time. 
So will you let me go with you?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I happen to have some free time. 
󠁿So will you let me go with you?

data.text:
Haaa~. Really, being able to let loose like that 
feels good~. We have lessons for our Lives too but, 
I guess karaoke feels a bit different.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa~. Really, being able to let loose like that 
󠁿feels good~. We have lessons for our Lives too but, 
󠁿I guess karaoke feels a bit different.

data.text:
Don't ask something so obvious~! Of course I'd be nervous! 
Every single time, I'm always quaking in my boots.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Don't ask something so obvious~! Of course I'd be nervous! 
󠁿Every single time, I'm always quaking in my boots.

data.text:
And if I were to mess up, it'd cause trouble for everyone 
else~. My voice is so shaky too. And when everyone around 
me is so perfect, I get even more nervous~.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿And if I were to mess up, it'd cause trouble for everyone 
󠁿else~. My voice is so shaky too. And when everyone around 
󠁿me is so perfect, I get even more nervous~.

data.text:
On top of that, the stage is a really special place, 
isn't it? It's not an atmosphere you'd be in normally……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿On top of that, the stage is a really special place, 
󠁿isn't it? It's not an atmosphere you'd be in normally……

data.text:
Of course, there's also fun and interesting parts, but the 
nerves are no joke~. Just thinking about it gets my heart pumping……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Of course, there's also fun and interesting parts, but the 
󠁿nerves are no joke~. Just thinking about it gets my heart pumping……

data.text:
That's how it is! Trainer-san, 
you should try standing there sometime――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿That's how it is! Trainer-san, 
󠁿you should try standing there sometime――

data.text:
……Oh, it's the next song. 
I've been practicing this song――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……Oh, it's the next song. 
󠁿I've been practicing this song――

data.text:
Wai-!? W-what are you doing all of a sudden? 
Ah, are you cheering!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Wai-!? W-what are you doing all of a sudden? 
󠁿Ah, are you cheering!?

data.text:
No, that's not really a cheer though!? Ahaa, ahahaha! 
Stop it! I can't sing if you're making me laugh~!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿No, that's not really a cheer though!? Ahaa, ahahaha! 
󠁿Stop it! I can't sing if you're making me laugh~!

data.text:
Huuuuu～～～…… That one just now, was probably 
the best song so far, don't you think?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: You're so good! I wanna hear more!

data.processed:
󠁿Huuuuu～～～…… That one just now, was probably 
󠁿the best song so far, don't you think?

data.text: Don't just make me do it, Trainer-san you should sing too!
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: A cheer song for Hishi Miracle……!

data.processed: 󠁿Don't just make me do it, Trainer-san you should sing too!

data.text: Yeah, yeah…… wait, there's no way there's a song like that――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, yeah…… wait, there's no way there's a song like that――

data.text:
You're just gonna sing acapella!? 
Ahahahaa, c'mon, stop that!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿You're just gonna sing acapella!? 
󠁿Ahahahaa, c'mon, stop that!

data.text: Haa-…… that was fun……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Haa-…… that was fun……

data.text:
What, why are you the one with the self-satisfied smirk on 
your face~? Halfway through, I was just laughing, you know.
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Sorry, I was just having fun……

data.processed:
󠁿What, why are you the one with the self-satisfied smirk on 
󠁿your face~? Halfway through, I was just laughing, you know.

data.text:
Well~ I did think you were letting 
it go to your head though~.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Well~ I did think you were letting 
󠁿it go to your head though~.

data.text:
(……But, it didn't really bother me though. 
I can tell they mean it when they're praising me, I guess)
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: All that singing made me hungry

data.processed:
󠁿(……But, it didn't really bother me though. 
󠁿I can tell they mean it when they're praising me, I guess)

data.text:
Ah. Same here~. 
How about heading to a family restaurant?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah. Same here~. 
󠁿How about heading to a family restaurant?

data.text:
Ah, a poster about the kid's meal…… Do you ever feel 
like just getting one sometimes? A kid's meal I mean.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, a poster about the kid's meal…… Do you ever feel 
󠁿like just getting one sometimes? A kid's meal I mean.

data.text:
Right~? I wonder why that is. And then there's something 
you just have to get if you come to a family restaurant――
data.name: Hishi MiracleHishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Right~? I wonder why that is. And then there's something 
󠁿you just have to get if you come to a family restaurant――

data.text:
Right, right. Anyways, getting fries is a must. 
Trainer-san, what about you?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Right, right. Anyways, getting fries is a must. 
󠁿Trainer-san, what about you?

data.text:
Something you always have to order……ah, 
or maybe some kind of weird mix you make with your drink?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Something you always have to order……ah, 
󠁿or maybe some kind of weird mix you make with your drink?

data.text:
Well, let's see~. Now I don't do it but, 
a loooo~ng time ago, what my friends and I used to do――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Well, let's see~. Now I don't do it but, 
󠁿a loooo~ng time ago, what my friends and I used to do――

data.text:
Huuu~. We ended up eating quite a lot, huh? 
Ate alot, and talked alot……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Huuu~. We ended up eating quite a lot, huh? 
󠁿Ate alot, and talked alot……

data.text: It almost felt like when I'm with my friends, I guess……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿It almost felt like when I'm with my friends, I guess……

data.text:
No, nothing. It's just that…… 
I thought Trainer-san would feel more like a teacher.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿No, nothing. It's just that…… 
󠁿I thought Trainer-san would feel more like a teacher.

data.text:
Like I would get nervous while talking to you, 
or feel some kind of distance…… kinda like 
between an adult and a kid. Something like that.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Like I would get nervous while talking to you, 
󠁿or feel some kind of distance…… kinda like 
󠁿between an adult and a kid. Something like that.

data.text: But, I really don't get that feeling from Trainer-san.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿But, I really don't get that feeling from Trainer-san.

data.text:
Ah, that it helps. It makes things easier. 
And I don't feel like I have to think too hard about it.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, that it helps. It makes things easier. 
󠁿And I don't feel like I have to think too hard about it.

data.text:
……but well, it feels more like you're the one being 
considerate of me, so that might be why it's easier.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……but well, it feels more like you're the one being 
󠁿considerate of me, so that might be why it's easier.

data.text:
Nothing. It's probably about time we head back. I laughed a 
bit too much today, so I'll probably get a good night's sleep.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Nothing. It's probably about time we head back. I laughed a 
󠁿bit too much today, so I'll probably get a good night's sleep.

data.text:
(…… normally, this is how most days go. But when there's a 
race, I really can feel the difference in passion, huh?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(…… normally, this is how most days go. But when there's a 
󠁿race, I really can feel the difference in passion, huh?)

data.text:
(I want to do my best to live up to expectations, 
and I'm working hard but…… I wonder what 
Trainer-san thinks about that difference)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(I want to do my best to live up to expectations, 
󠁿and I'm working hard but…… I wonder what 
󠁿Trainer-san thinks about that difference)

data.text:
(Even if I can't match that passion, I do want to 
close that gap, even if just a little though~. Hmmm, 
maybe some kind of gratitude for being so passionate?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(Even if I can't match that passion, I do want to 
󠁿close that gap, even if just a little though~. Hmmm, 
󠁿maybe some kind of gratitude for being so passionate?)

data.text:
(No, no, that would feel kind of weird. 
Not like that, maybe something more……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(No, no, that would feel kind of weird. 
󠁿Not like that, maybe something more……)

data.text:
Maybe some kind of present……? No, would something 
like that be weird~? They'd be like 『But, why?』 huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Maybe some kind of present……? No, would something 
󠁿like that be weird~? They'd be like 『But, why?』 huh?

data.text: Hmmmm~, mmmmm~…… it's so hard~……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Hmmmm~, mmmmm~…… it's so hard~……

data.text:
Hishi Miracle was beside me mumbling to herself. 
I wonder if something's wrong. I'd like it if 
she wouldn't hesitate to consult me……
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle was beside me mumbling to herself. 
󠁿I wonder if something's wrong. I'd like it if 
󠁿she wouldn't hesitate to consult me……

data.text:
From what I could hear, maybe she's 
worried about gifts for her friends.
data.processed:
󠁿From what I could hear, maybe she's 
󠁿worried about gifts for her friends.

data.text:
Then I guess I don't need to worry too much. 
While gazing at the sunset, I matched my 
pace with Hishi Miracle as we headed back.
data.processed:
󠁿Then I guess I don't need to worry too much. 
󠁿While gazing at the sunset, I matched my 
󠁿pace with Hishi Miracle as we headed back.
